overview: In 2050, Earth is destroyed by a nuclear war, which determined the death of 90% of human race. Thousands of people lived inside fallout shelters for years, waiting for another chance. One of them is Adele Stein. After seven years spent in a bunker, she is torn away from her family, and brought to one of the few continents still liveable: Antarctica. What is left of the world, of mankind, is governed by the Oculus.
title: Apeiron
